entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
